products.title: Measuring for Perfect Fit Blinds
products.metadescription: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £15.76 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Perfect Fit Venetian Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our range of Verona 25mm Perfect Fit aluminium Venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. 
 
A stylish grey tone, this Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home.  Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look.  Perfect Fit blinds are designed for use with a uPVC door and window as they are drill, and screw-free! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this Perfect Fit Venetian blind made by our team of experts, but it also comes with a FREE five year guarantee.  Still not sure?  Why not take us up on our free sampling service, that way you can be sure your new blind is the perfect fit!

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Ash Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A mid-grey shade, the Ash Grey 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating grey headrail and a silver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.productdescription: Grey is a popular colour and that won’t change anytime soon. The Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit blind will enhance any room it’s in with it’s gentle grey colour. If you’re after a dimout Perfect Fit blind and grey is your colour, this blind is for you.  Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.productdescription: Part of our Meadow Flower range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Mayfair Taupe Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Taupe Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the Mayfair Ash Dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative Perfect Fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Bewitch all who befall your Mayfair Noir Dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Update your windows with the exquisite Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit, for a charming look to your windows. The smooth grey tone is dappled only by the light and shadow of the blind's ripping pleats, to give an ultra-textured look that would go beautifully with other tactile grey fabrics within your interior. The frame is designed to be a perfect colour match for white and anthracite UPVC windows, so the installed blind will look like a seamless part of your windows. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Mint Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Mint Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Get the freshness of a crisp white with the eye-catching charm of a pastel with the Mayfair Mint Dimout Pleated Perfect Fit. This delightful pleated fabric has a gentle checkering effect when viewed up close, that smoothes out from a distance into a creamy mint. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: The Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. The ivory tone offers a classical neutral, its creamy butter-tinted hue pairing especially well with wooden furnishings and stately interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Vassal Mist Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Vassal Mist Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: For something a little different, Vassal Mist twins a vintage and nautical feel, to create a muted grey blind with the gentlest touch of green. The colour is created with tiny dense checks that can only be seen up close, for flawless continual colouration when standing back. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Vassal Frost is a crisp white with a delicate tint, for a clean and bright blind that has a calmness and purity about it. Matching beautifully with its white UPVC frame, the innovative Perfect Fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fit. The dimout style allows a gentle scatter of light to filter through even when the blind is closed, to enable both light and privacy together, making this an ideal choice for 'daytime' rooms such sunrooms and living rooms. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Paper your windows in gold for a touch of midas luxe. The Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit is a stunning gold-tone fabric made up of delicate checkers, that fold in pleats to add interest down the fabric. This gentle texture is enhanced by the dimout style, which allows for gentle light filtering during the daytime, to bathe the whole room in a sun-enhancing golden glow. Like all blinds in the Perfect Fit system, the shade clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fitting. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. products.title: Soho Brown Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Soho Brown Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Enjoy a classic tone in your window with the Soho Brown Pleated Dimout Perfect Fit. The rich brown of this blind is an ideal match for retro furnishings made from dark wood, such as mahogany and walnut. The fabric itself is not a dull one-tone, but is instead built up from overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and vivid colour. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, further enlivening this exciting blind. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Soho Slate Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Soho Slate Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Soho Slate Dimout Perfect Fit features fabric built out of overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and energetic slate tone. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, creating a dark sparkle effect as the light shines through. products.metadescription: Raw Aluminium Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, Perfect Fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are our most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Showcasing the metal slats in their natural form, Raw Aluminium is a straightforward and fuss-free style for rooms with clean decor Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Infusion asc Saffron Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Saffron Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4141. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Saffron Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.metadescription: Zambezi 25mm Anthracite Grey Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £23.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A bold dark grey shade, this Zambezi Anthracite Perfect Fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish.  Grey shades are not only clean and trend-setting, but can be either complimented with co-ordinating accessories, or can be the background to a more bolder colour palette. 
 
Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this Perfect Fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your uPVC windows or doors. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new Perfect Fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in our Yorkshire workshop by our team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Measuring for Perfect Fit Blinds
products.metadescription: Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind in White. Made to measure from £29.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer. Featured here in our modern warm white colour - they're both attractive and stylish additions to your room.

products.productdescription: A brilliant white shade, the Pure White 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any Anthracite uPVC window or door.  Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating white headrail and a colour co-ordinating white bottom bar.

Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: For a darker grey in your window the Hampton Grey Pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this Hampton Dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free fitting.  Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Create elegant shading in your window with the Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your Perfect Fit frame to your UPVC window for an integrated, cohesive look. The Cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors. The dimout style allows for some lightfall even when the blind is closed, to enable brightness alongside privacy. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with Kingston Royal Blue Perfect Fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. products.title: Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: The Kingston fabrics have a pebble-dash effect to them that creates an organic fabric that matches gorgeously with other organic materials and furnishings. Kingston Flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart Perfect Fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Like all the Kingston blinds, Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit benefits from a pebble-dash effect across the fabric body that creates an organic texture. The dark black fabric is softened by this dappling texture, while the dimout style further enhances this effect by allowing gentle light levels to flow through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart Perfect Fit system clips in flush against the window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly. Struggling to cover your french doors?
